physical_appearance: This is a set of garments that form bridegroom's clothes. It consists of a tunic, a pair of trousers, and a cloth. The garments feature intricate embroided designs. The bottom hem of the trousers match the embroidery design on the tunic.
sgcool_label_text: This set of garments - tunic, trousers and a turban cloth - form a set of bridegroom's clothes among the Dhebaria Rabari community of east Kutch. The group features excellent cotton embroidery incorporating mirrorwork embellishments. The fabric of the trousers is handwoven Mashroo silk, while the turban cloth is made from handspun cotton.
subject_terms_1: folk costume geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) trousers textiles (visual works) robes (main garments) ceremonial costume bridegrooms
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Tunics Motifs Embroidery Wedding costume Pants Robes Rabaris Bridegrooms
